tvā paviṃ maññati paviyā maññati pavito maññati pavimmeti maññati pavi abhinandati taṃ kassa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ āpato sañjānāti āpaṃ āpato saññatvā

nāti taṃtejaṃ tejato saññatvā tejaṃ maññati tejasmiṃ maññati tejato maññati tejaṃ meti maññati tejaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadā

sañjānāti pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito saññatvā pajāpatiṃ maññati pajapajāpatasmiṃ maññati pajāpatito maññati pajāpatiṃ meti maññati pajāpatiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi brahmaṃ brahmato sañjānāti brahmaṃ to brahmato saññatvā brahmaṃ maññati brahmani maññati brahmato maññati brahmaṃ meti maññati brahmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kassa
hetuṃ apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ābhassare ābhassarato sañjānāti ābhassare ābhassarato saññatvā ābhassare maññati ābhassessaresu mañña

ññatvā subhakiṇhe maññati subhakiṇhesu maññati subhakiṇhato maññati subhakiṇhe meti maññati subhakiṇhe abhinandati taṃ kisa hetu apariññātaṃ kassā ti vadāmi vehappale vehapphalelato sañjā
nāti vehapphalale vehapphalato saññatvā vehapphale maññati vehapphalesa maññati vehapphalato maññati vehapphale meti maññati vehapphale abhinandati taṃ kissa
hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhūto sañjānāti abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saññatvā abhibhū maññati abhibhusmiṃ maññati abhibhuto maññati abhibhuṃ
meti maññati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetuṃ apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato sañjānāti ākāsānañjāyatanaṃ ākā
sānañcāyatanato saññatvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ maññati ākāsāvanañcāyatanasmiṃ maññati ākāsānañcāyatanato maññati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ meti maññati ākāsānañcā
yatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanato sañjānāti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanato sa
ññatvā viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ maññati viññāṇañcāyatanasmiṃ maññati viññāṇañcāyatanato maññati viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ meti maññati viññāṇa

ñcaññāyatanato saññatvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ maññati ākiñcaññāyatanasmiṃ maññati ākiñcaññāyatanato maññati ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ meti maññati ākiñcaññāya
tanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ novasaññāyatanato sañjānāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāñasaññāyatanato saññatvā
nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasmiṃ maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ meti maññati nevasa
ññānāsaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññāta tassā ti vadāmi

diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato sañjānāti diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato saññatvā diṭṭhaṃ maññati diṭṭhasmi maññati diṭṭhato maññati diṭṭhaṃ me

maññati sutaṃ meti maññati sutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi muta mutato ñasañjānāti mutaṃ mutato saññatvā mutaṃ maññati mutasmiṃ maññati muta
to maññati mutaṃ meti maññati mutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa tehetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viññātaṃ viññātato sañjānāti viññātaṃ viññātato saññatvā viññātaṃ
maññāññati viññātasmiṃ maññati viññātato maññati viññātaṃ meti maññati viññātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ekattaṃ ekattato sañjānāti ekattaṃ ekattato sañña
tvā ekattaṃ nānatta maññati ekattasmiṃ maññati ekattato maññati ekattaṃ meti maññati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattaṃ nānattato ñasañjānāti
nānattaṃ nānattato saññatvā nānattaṃ maññati nānattasmiṃ maññati nānattato maññati nānattaṃ meti maññati nānattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sabba sabbaṃ
to sañjānāti sabbaṃ sabbaṃbbato saññatvā sabbaṃ maññati sabbasmiṃ maññati sabbato maññati sabba meti maññati sabbaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ nibbā
nato sañjānāti nibbānaṃ maññati nibbānato saññatvā nibbānaṃ maññati nibbānaṃsmiṃ maññati nibbānato maññati nibbānaṃ meti maññati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi puthu
jjanavasena paṭhamanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu sekkho appattamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ pattayamāno viharati sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti
paviṃ pavito abhiññāya pathaviṃ mā maññi paviyā mā maññi pavito mā maññi pavimmeti mā maññi pavi mā abhinandi taṃ kissa hetu pa
riññeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhaṇṇe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññā
ññātañcāyataṃtanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānana
to abhiññāya nibbānaṃ mā maññi nibbānasmiṃ mā maññi nibbānānato mā maññi nibbānaṃ meti mā maññi nibbānāna mā abhinandi taṃ kissa hetu pariññeyyhaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhava
sena dutiyanayabhūmiparicchedo

soyopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arāarahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parakkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto
sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya vapaviṃ na maññati paviṃyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavimmeti na maññati paviṃ nābhina
ndati taṃ kissa hetuṃ pariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ teja vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhituṃ ākāsānañcāyata
naṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbāna
to abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetuṃ mariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi khīṇāsavava
sena tatiyanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohikabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhībhavasayojano sammañño vimutto
sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati patavito na maññati pavimmeti na maññati paviṃ
nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khāyā rāgassa vītarāgattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāya bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ
ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyaṃyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sataṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānā
ti nibbānaṃ bbānibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā nāgassa vītarāgattā
khīṇāsavavasena catutthanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusatavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadatto parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyo
jano sammadaññā vimutto sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavimmeti na maññati pa
viṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vītadosattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcā
yatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbāna
to abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vītadosattā khīṇāsavavasena pha
ñcamanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhā anuppattasadatto parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto
sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavimmeti na maññati pavi nā
bhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vitamohattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ abhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcā
yatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ akañcāññāyataṃtanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyataṃtanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbāna
to abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na ña maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā pamohassa vītamohattā khīṇā
savavasena yabhūmiparicchedo

tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavi
to na maññati pavimmeti na maññati paviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātantaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ
brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ vi
ññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na mañña
ti nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātantaṃ tatāgatassā ti vadāmi satthuvasena sattamanayabhūmiparicchedo

tathāgatopi bhikkhave araṃrahaṃ sammāsammāmbudo paviṃ pavito
abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavimmeti na maññati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā
bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisabbumbuddho
ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyaṃyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ne
vasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbā
nato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhimanandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabba
so taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi satthuvasena aṭhamanayabhūmiparicchedo idamavoca bhagavā na te bhikkhu
cāgavato bhāsitaṃ ābhinandanti mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ paṭhamaṃ
